channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023090231
item.description:
Report X-2023090231

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: DOVER
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE SOUND OF A RATTLING AEROSOL CAN. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 12 OUNCE AEROSOL CAN OF FLAMMABLE KRYLON FUSION 5X MATTE SWEET FIG SPRAY PAINT. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
